name: Topple Tower (Kroporo)
description:
In Topple Tower, players extract blocks out of an unstable tower.
Sit back and enjoy a chill round of tower deconstruction!

How many blocks can you remove before the tower falls?

Controls:
- Mouse Right: Look around the tower
- Mouse Left: Push blocks
- Space: Hit table

WebGL might not like the amount of physics calculations depending on your setup.
Try the standalone version if you're having performance issues! (It's only 50mb)
